description.value: You've learned more naga magic. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fleet Step], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal]. You can cast the chosen spell as a 1st-level occult innate spell once that day.

value.value: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat
